line: okay ross i realise that you did not expect to walk in and see that but
but what you saw that is the extent of it okay
no come on that is a lie
okay we also kissed in barbados but we did not plan it okay
and the only reason that that happened was because i saw you kissing charlie
look we probably should have talked to you about this before it ever happened but
we feel so terrible about this ross
yeah but it did happen so
can we just close the door
but if i had not walked in here would you
ross this is not how we wanted you to find out about this
you have every right to go nuts
do you see me go nuts
no but you know what i mean
if you two are happy then happy for you
i do not know why it is coming out all loud and squeaky because really fine
not saying i was not a little surprised to see you guys kissing
i mean at first i was like
but now that had time to absorb it lovin this
you know what we should do
yes we will do it tomorrow night
look do not you think that will be a little weird
the only thing weird would be if someone did not like mexican food because making fajitas
god this adoption stuff is so overwhelming
there is inter country adoption dependency adoption
there are so many ways to go and this is like the biggest decision of our lives
there is a hair in my coffee
hey have you seen frank jr
because he is meeting me here with the triplets
every time you say triplets i immediately think of three hot blonde 19 year olds
hey what is all this stuff
oh they are brochures from different adoption agencies
oh this one is so cute get this one
that is not really how it works
well if you are having a hard time you should talk to my friends bill and colleen
hey honey would not that be great
when we are in a public place there are certain rules
that is not what we talked about
oh my goodness they have all gotten so big
pulling the tampons out of the ladys purse
and that is chandler climbing on chandler and that is leslie throwing bagels at him
ah can i just say i know we are doing this for ross and that is cool but if it was up to me this is not what we had be doing on our first date
well what would we be doing
take you out for a romantic night
some champagne fancy dinner feel you up on the carriage ride home
so did you bring a little something for ross
it is stuff you left at my apartment
and you know you can just give me my stuff whenever you want
yeah i did not throw any of that out
you are gonna have to introduce me to your new girlfriend
just kidding i know rachel i know
okay well we brought you some wine
and what did you bring me
underwear a toothbrush and van halen cd
i can use all these things
gosh ross you know you seem a little
why do not you try to relax okay
that is a very good idea
gonna go make a pitcher of margaritas
look at them sleeping there like angels
yeah i really cherish these moments because before you know it they are gonna be awake again
well they may be a handful but they are so cute
oh god the last time i babysat them they did the funniest thing
i have not slept in four years
that is a that is a long time
you just do not know how hard it is phoebe
there is just so many of them
you know two i can handle
you just hold one in each hand but what do i do when the third one runs at me with his bike helmet on
got no more hands to protect my area
there is three of them phoebe three
i counted them when they were coming out of my area
oh no no no i cannot say it it is too horrible
oh my god frank are you thinking of leaving
because i did not have those triplets so you could just run out on them
i just was thinking that you know maybe you could take one
thank you so much for seeing us
phoebe has told us such great things about you guys
oh please we are happy to help
we went through the same thing when we were adopting
so a lot of malfunctioning wee wees and hoo hoos in this room huh
i mean you have a lovely home
well we appreciate anything you can tell us
well actually i think this might help
it is pretty much all the information you need
everything is broken down into categories and then cross referenced and then colour coded to correspond with the forms in the back
i think i just had a tiny orgasm
i know the process is frustrating but it is so worth it
adopting owen was the best thing that ever happened to us
you want me to wash my hands first do not you
it is just so pretty and white
the bathroom is down the hall to your left
i would have told him to do it too
hey i was in the scouts too
yeah in fact my father was a den mother
you know how to use a compass
i have a badge in it
love to but i gotta get back to talking to your parents
they are telling us all about how they adopted you
the first batch of margaritas was not so great but the second batch is gooooood
well maybe the next batch we could all get some
oh guys this is fun is not it
and when are the fajitas gonna be ready
there is no weirdness no tension
we should do more stuff together
okay where do you think we we can go
look charlie i just want you to know
ross is just having a little trouble adjusting to the thought of joey and me
you know he normally does not drink like this
my father is a raging alcoholic
oh sorry have i made this evening uncomfortable
be careful very hot plate very hot plate
ross you do not even have oven mitts on
cannot seriously be talking about me taking one of your kids can we
no of course we are not
alice would never go for it right
oh i do not know she is pretty tired too i think we have got her onboard
well just you know for arguments sake you know hypothetically
which one would you be willing to give up
oh you had be getting a really good one
i mean you know he is really funny
like the other day he made up this joke
what is green and says hey a frog
oh no you cannot have him he is too funny
no she is she is the only one that knows how to burp the alphabet
oh no no you cannot have chandler no
i got big hopes for her
she is gonna be a doctor or a realtor
i think we just ran out of kids
oh i think you are right
phoebe i do not think i can give one of them up
i mean you know they drive me crazy but they are my babies
i did not realise things were so bad
i can i can babysit any time you want
you name the day and be there
but you know i can move some stuff around and be there
you and alice just take the whole day together
you had do that for us
that is what sisters are for
oh crap do not wake up do not wake up
they are in the kitchen getting something to eat
can you believe how nice they are
what did you do in the bathroom
i did not get to the bathroom
i bumped into owen on the way and he did not know he was adopted
and there is a slight chance i may have told him
oh my god where is my purse
i can replace everything in there
get that binder and let us go
oh you do not have to eat the sour worms
go get him in a second
by the way you should know we have not told him he is adopted yet
do not you think on some level he already knows
and he paid me 50 dollars not to tell
which technically now you should give back
you told him he is adopted
so sorry but you should have a sign out there or something
or at least whisper it to people when they come in the door
owen does not know he is adopted and he also thinks that santa is real
we have to get out of here baby
i would like to make a toast to rachel and joey
and what is life without love
oh my god are we supposed to answer
the v is for this very surprising turn of events which still fine with by the way
e is for how extremely normal i find it
and now one day you might get married and have children of your own
ross you do not seem okay
sorry it must be the pressure of entertaining
i think everyone would feel better if we had some flan
i i have to take off
sorry i have a really early class in the morning but this has been lovely
and you thought it would be awkward with joey and that you never really liked rachel
call you in the morning okay
god rachel what ross just said that is just so
oh that is okay girls tend not to like me
okay i guess it is just flan for three
i think we are gonna take off too
you guys are a couple now
i mean you probably just want to be alone
no no it is just that it is getting late
we have got plenty of margaritas
i do not even know what that is for
i think gonna stay here and make sure he is okay
yeah that is probably a good idea
you know what joey i do not think he is ever gonna be okay with this
it does not look good does it
did you stay here all night
so you took off my pants and shoes
you actually did that when you were dancing to the chicago soundtrack
look ross about about rachel and i
listen you do not have to worry about that okay
well she and i said from the beginning that we were not gonna do anything unless you were okay with it
hey what are you talking about
of course you are not fine
i mean we have not been a couple in like six years
oh my god is that right
that is what i hear yeah
and because of me you guys are not gonna be together
really what is this thing with you and rachel
come on i mean you know me you know
and she feels the same way
well then maybe it is time we all moved on
yeah but ross i mean you are not okay with it
oh my god still with charlie are not i
i mean she did not see the dance did she
no no no no that was that was just for me
uhm we just wanna give you a heads up
owen did not know he was adopted and monica told him
still he had to find out sometime
yeah but how would you like it if someone told the triplets that you gave birth to them
gonna go tell emma she was an accident
